0.name: Karen
0.text: AI Initializing... Press SPACE to continue or ESC to skip.

1.name: Karen
1.text: Initialization complete. IRIS class AI, designation KAREN, ready for duty. Good morning, Captain.

2.name: Captain
2.text: Good morning, Karen. What do we have today?

3.name: Karen
3.text: Good morning, Captain. Today, we are running a practice run against demo ships.

4.name: Karen
4.text: Use the directional arrow keys to move. Press SPACE to fire. Press ESC to pause.

5.name: Karen
5.text: Since this a demo, the demo ships endlessly spawn until you press ESC.
